content.rendered:
Hi! I’m Edmond Miu.

I am a product designer.

Currently I am working on design systems and using them to build products.

I love how design systems bring about uniform branding, team collaboration and reducing cognitive load. So that my team and I can concentrate our efforts into UX. 

I am a product designer.

Currently I am working on 2 major projects.

The first is a Design System for a SaaS platform which includes products used for marketing, trading, reporting, and user administration.

The second is an innovative sports betting product that currently does not exist on the market. *hushhush* 

I love how design systems bring about efficiency, uniform branding, and team collaboration. 

See Full Bio

Most Recent Projects

Nova futur Ltd

NovaHub

A solution to facilitate team work, transparency and prevent inconsistencies on a large scale SaaS backoffice.

#DesignSystem #MajorProject
Nova futur Ltd

Linking Products

Building links between products, to benefit users with efficient workflows. 

#DesignThinking #LinkingFlows #Teamwork
Nova futur Ltd

Simulate

A solution to increase betting opportunities when limited football matches are available
for end users.

#IC #MVP #ProductDesign

Graphic design Background

Part of my beginnings stem from being a graphic designer.
Below are some that I particularly enjoyed working on.

Thanks for stopping by

Lets have a chat sometime!
